name: terrazzo tank top
notes:
the terrazzo tank top is a round-neck singlet with a textured mesh surface. perfect on its own or over swimsuits, bandeaus or sports bras, this slouchy camisole is the comfiest thing youâ€™ll wear all summer! this crochet camisole is worked up in the single crochet column stitch which is the perfect stitch for drapey and airy projects.

this pattern is accompanied by a step-by-step video tutorial.
